commit.message:
re PR libgcj/18014 (java.util.Locale changes variant to upper case)

2005-01-10  Michael Koch  <konqueror@gmx.de>

	PR libgcj/18014
	* java/util/Locale.java (Locale): Don't uppercase variant.
	(getISOCountries): Fixed typo in javadoc.

From-SVN: r93150

files.patch:

+
+	PR libgcj/18014
+	* java/util/Locale.java (Locale): Don't uppercase variant.
+	(getISOCountries): Fixed typo in javadoc.
+
